Law of Gentle Integration.ritual: Sit in a stream and release the memory

Law of Origin Consciousness.ritual: Enter the Hall of First Light, kneel before the mirror, and remember your name.

Law of Emotional Flow.ritual: Enter the Chamber of Waters. Speak the name of the feeling you buried. Let it rise and pass through you.

Law of Death and Rebirth.ritual: Stand at the edge of the Ash Garden. Speak the name of what must die. Burn it. Step into new light.
